00039 class gr_simple_correlator : public gr_block
00040 {
00041   static const int OVERSAMPLE = 8;
00042   enum state_t { ST_LOOKING, ST_LOCKED };
00043

00045   state_t        d_state;
00046   int            d_seqno;

00050   unsigned char *d_pktbuf;
00051   int            d_best_fit;            // [0,7]
00052   unsigned int   d_shift_reg[OVERSAMPLE];
00053
